dialogue.raw_text: I'm sorry, Austin, that was a cheap shot.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: No, baby, you're right. I was wrong to judge you. I guess I am... jealous.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: But the Austin Powers I knew was wild and crazy and free. He could never be jealous.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: That Austin is gone. I've changed. I knew someone, not long ago, a very special woman. She taught me that life isn't about jumping into the sack with whoever comes along, it's about caring and responsibility. And while it is true she turned out to be an evil robot minion of Dr. Evil, I suppose I really did... love her.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Was that your wife?

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Yes, Vanessa.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Listen, Austin, I can't pretend to understand everything you've gone through, but I trust you. I'll make you a deal: if we get out of here alive, I'll give monogamy a try.

dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Yes, silly.

dialogue.name: dialogue

Meanwhile, you dig a pit and line it with makeshift punji sticks made from sharpened toothbrushes. The guard falls in, Bob's your uncle, and we've got the key.  What do you think?

dialogue.name: dialogue

I eat because I'm unhappy and I'm unhappy because I eat. (starts to cry) I'm caught in a cycle and there's no escape!

dialogue.raw_text: Maybe inside that Fat Bastard there's a thin bastard, trying to get out

I'm gonna go to the gym everyday. If you'll excuse me, there's someone I have to get in touch with and forgive... myself. (pause) Sorry. I farted. (pause) It's a long road ahead.

direction.raw_text: To be honest it was terrifying. It felt like sitting on top of a bomb. As I punched through the atmosphere, I said 'Oh my God!' and I soiled myself.

dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Jubilation.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: He did it, he saved the world! (calming down) Of course, I thought he might.

direction.name: direction

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Dr. Evil hits the SELF-DESTRUCT button and climbs aboard the rocket, which blasts off.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Uh-oh. (beat) I think I just got my mojo back. Really.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Austin, you had it all along. No one can take your, mojo away from you!

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: . EVIL Good-bye, Mr. Powers, for the last time.

direction.name: direction

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: don't know, sir. It's hard to describe.  It's... it's-

direction.name: direction

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Pay attention!

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: I'm sorry, Comrade Teacher. (pointing out window) was distracted by that enormous flying-

dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: (looking up) It looks like a giant-

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Penis! (pointing to her chart) The male reproductive organ. Also known as tallywhackers, wankers, schlongs, or--

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Yes, sir?

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Any word from Austin?

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: We've picked up his signal, but the lunar base seems to self-destructing.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: (on microphone) Austin, if you can hear me, use the time portal! There's no time to get to the lunar module! Use the time portal!

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: . EVIL'S MOON BASE Austin stumbles. Felicity looks at him.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: The TIME PORTAL is fifty feet away. Austin and Felicity run towards it. In the foreground, are a stack of conveniently placed barrels. As they run behind the barrels, an obvious AUSTIN STUNT DOUBLE and an obvious FELICITY STUNT DOUBLE emerge in their place. The stunt doubles grab a winch hanging above them and cross over to the TIME PORTAL in a dramatic series of acrobatic flips and stunts. The stunt doubles run behind another conveniently placed pile of barrels. Austin and Felicity emerge in their place and run through the TIME PORTAL. The TIME PORTAL reads "1999".

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Austin, you have to get to the time portal!

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Come with me, Felicity! It's the only way out!

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Austin, will I fit in the Nineties?

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: If I did, anyone can. Let's go, baby!

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: 1999 - DAY It is the most up-to-date modern apartment you've ever seen in your life. There is a large screen TV, a DVD player etc. Movers move in tasteful modern furniture and various other accouterments of moving. Felicity puts a CD on an old style turntable.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: : SCREEEECH!!

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: Felicity smiles broadly, revealing that she now has TERRIBLE TEETH like Austin's.

direction.name: direction
direction.raw_text: They kiss.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Sorry!

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Don't worry baby it takes some getting used to. Let me ask you Felicity, do you feel any side effects from the time travel?

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: I'm as healthy as a horse.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: I love you, Felicity.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: And I love you.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Do you want to get married?

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Absolutely not.

dialogue.name: dialogue
dialogue.raw_text: Thank God.
